trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner" /> 類別提供資料的設計階段檢視。

trans-unit.source: The name of the view for which the data source provides data.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源為其提供資料之檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView" /> class using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner" /> object and view name.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView" /> 物件和檢視名稱，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to retrieve or create.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取或建立的最小資料列數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate real data.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示資料範例，<see langword="false" /> 表示實際資料。

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the provided number of rows and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: 產生設計階段資料，該資料符合使用所提供資料列數之關聯資料來源控制項的結構描述，並傳回布林 (Boolean) 值，指出資料是範例還是實際資料。

trans-unit.source: Design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 符合相關聯資料來源控制項之結構描述的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述由這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDesignerDataSourceView" /> 物件所表示之資料的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" /> or an object that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />.
